snippet: A Pentagon spokesman said Wednesday that the fatal shooting of a Marine on guard duty by a colleague at Camp Lejeune pointed to a “negligent discharge.”
abstract: Pentagon spokesman says that fatal shooting of a Marine on guard duty by a colleague at Camp Lejeune appears to have been an accident; Marine who fired shot is in custody, but remains unidentified along with victim.
lead_paragraph: A Pentagon spokesman said Wednesday that the fatal shooting of a Marine on guard duty by a colleague at Camp Lejeune pointed to a “negligent discharge.”

headline.main: North Carolina: Marine’s Death Thought to Be Accident
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Marine Death Thought to Be Accident

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
